name: Hermes Message Plant
short_description:
It seems operations teams always have the issue of 'too much' email to the point the it only becomes noise, thus reducing productivity and creating more problems than it helps eliminate.  Hermes Message Plant's [HMP] intent is to consolidate numerous input sources into a single repository for which the dissemination of information can be delivered on a per-user configuration.

With an extensible Plugin-API, developers can easily add any type of event listener required.  Existing plugin’s included: email, Jira, OP5, New Relic, SMS. Additional features added included a RESTful, SOAP and standard http-POST listeners.  Dissemination of incoming information is based on the user's selected medium of delivery: email, twitter, facebook, blogs, SMS, Hermes Client.. etc
summary: Control delivery of multiple source messages
